name: Hentai Midori
description:
"Hentai Midori" is a unique puzzle in which the image is divided into 8, 32, 50 pieces and the player should move the puzzle pieces of the playing field to restore the original image.

This is a simple, exciting game that requires logical thinking and the ability to plan your actions.

Features of the game:
  • Achievements;
  • Sex toys;
  • Mode "GOD";
  • Relaxing and romantic music.

Enjoy the game process to reproduce photos of beautiful girls and relax with relaxing music. The game also has a "GOD" mode, try it if you are tired of collecting puzzles.
